if you re interested in the full autumn wheat collection simply click on the link below we ve got you covered with our crochet pattern complete with a helpful video tutorial following along has never been easier plus it s available in sizes ranging from baby to adult so everyone can enjoy the warmth and comfort join our vibrant community of crochet lovers and embark on an exciting crochet-along journey don t let this opportunity slip away - create stunning pieces for the upcoming chilly months what makes this ear warmer truly special is that it s crocheted flat making it perfect for beginners get ready to be both comfy and stylish with us today ✨ what size can i make this ear warmer headband ✨ ✔️ ear warmer - 8 sizes baby to adult this ear warmer is crocheted flat once you ve made your rectangle we will join the edges with a twisted seam this pattern also includes a guide to create the crochet ear warmer with any weight of yarn this is a great project for diving into your stash and making gifts easy peasy ✨ extra support & tips ✨ ✔️ video tutorials linked on youtube ✔️ join a community of crocheters ✔️ guide to make the ear warmer with any weight yarn ✨ what you will need to make this crochet ear warmer✨ yarn wecrochet upcycle worsted 1 - 33% alpaca 34% wool 33% acrylic 219yds/100g colorway shown sage weight 4 worsted yarn quantities 25 35 55 70 80 90 100 115 yds 1 ball for all sizes yarn substitutions listed in pattern notions scissors 2 yarn needle 3 removable stitch marker 4 crochet hook h 5 0mm crochet hook 5 ✨ hey i m briana k ✨ join the autumn-inspired crochet along for a cozy crochet experience we ll be creating beautiful wearables together in the briana k community collection i ve designed this collection to be fun and easy with only 1-2 seams required you ll love the pretty aesthetic and perfect fit of these approachable pieces make them for yourself or as gifts i ve enjoyed creating items to match my nephew this season get ready to learn new crochet techniques and build a wardrobe full of warmth and style join me and let s crochet together for the entire collection visit https //brianakdesigns etsy com/listing/1606279143 6 -
